# ChangeLog
## v1.3.0
* NODE-5908 : Enabled service discovery for PCI & RNPCI pools by default
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5908

## v1.1.13
* Added LnP env

## v1.1.11
* Corrected authz sandbox endpoint, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3491

## v1.1.10
* Exclude test.json at publishing to avoid causing issues to dev mode when they run unit-tests, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3073

## v1.1.9
* Fixed: Should use `appName` instead of `nuggetName`
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2820

## v1.1.8
* Fixed: Yaml with `---` is failing, should return empty object.
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2813

## v1.1.7
* Fixed: Hidden file should be ignore & added console.log for logging.

## v1.1.5
* Removed localhost from test.json to avoid issues in other module tests that use this module

## v1.1.3
* Fixed pre-production endpoint

## v1.1.2
* Changes pertaining to parity with Raptor
* Changed service name from authSvc to authSvcDiscovery to prevent collision with hostip-checker-ebay.authSvc

## v1.1.1
* Removed shutdown scripts as they are no longer required because `_discovered` is updated according to `ServiceDiscoveryClientComponentStatus.timestamp`

## v1.1.0
* Added support for serviceTag
* Code refactoring to prevent exposing private methods

## v1.0.9
* Fixed : Service resolution failure should not fail refreshCache
[https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2024](https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2024)

## v1.0.8
* Removed the serviceId prefix for service urns, as it's breaking tests and complicates refactoring

## v1.0.7
* Prefix urn with serviceId in VI instead of systemLabels

## v1.0.6
* Changed local cache, which was a map, to a config-bean

## v1.0.5
* Changed error to warning, when buildCache fails within forceRefresh()

## v1.0.4
* Moved VI to devDependency

## v1.0.3
* Fixed dependency url pointing to github 

## v1.0.2
* Added systemLabelsIgnoreCase to fetch service endpoints from discovery

## v1.0.1
* Ability to disable service-discovery at application level

## v1.0.0
* Initial release providing the feature to resolve service endpoints using service-discovery
